text:
需要另行等待供應商回覆／海外小幫手採購，
當中所需時間不定，到貨日期亦會較遲。
＊不接急單。
📣訂購須知
⚠️ 圖片只供參考，實物瑕疵/損傷有可能未完全展示，一切以實物為準※
⚠️ 商品最終發貨日期，價格和尺寸規格以日本當地官方網站為準(海外限定/海外版本除外)，如有更改，恕不另行通知，請留意相關官方公佈，敬請見諒。
trans:
Additional wait time is required for supplier feedback/overseas assistant procurement.
Delivery times are uncertain, and arrival dates may be delayed.
* Rush orders are not accepted.
📣 Order Notice:
⚠️ Images are for reference only. Actual goods may have imperfections or damage not visible in the images. Everything is based on the actual product.
⚠️Final delivery dates, prices, and specifications are subject to the official Japanese website (excludes overseas-limited or versions). Changes will not be individually notified; please follow official announcements.
